articles.author: Ben Church
articles.title: Four ways the 2023 Women’s World Cup is breaking new ground - CNN
articles.description: There have been a total of eight previous editions of the Women’s World Cup but this year’s tournament in Australia and New Zealand promises to look very different.
articles.content:
There have been a total of eight previous editions of the Womens World Cup, but this years tournament in Australia and New Zealand promises to look very different.
